translation.ja: 大学院卒　海兵隊を経て 強盗殺人課の警部 シカゴで何人も大物を挙(あ)げ フランキー･ヨンダーを殺(や)った

translation.ja: 義理の娘はロクデナシの 父親を持ってて― 手がつけられない

translation.en: I got a wife. We're passing each other on the down slope of a marriage...

translation.en: You know what that's about?

translation.en: Yeah. Having enough time.

translation.en: There's a flip side to that coin.

translation.en: Because no matter what, you will not get in my way.

translation.en: We've been face to face, yeah...

translation.en: ...but I will not hesitate. Not for a second.

translation.en: Maybe that's the way it'll be.

translation.en: Or who knows?

translation.en: Or maybe we'll never see each other again.

translation.en: They dumped us.

translation.en: - They dumped us. - What do you mean, they dumped us?

translation.en: Chris slipped his tail.

translation.en: He doesn't talk about scores with Charlene... ...so there's nothing for me to get from Marciano. I tried.

translation.en: - What about Cheritto? - Same.

translation.en: Transponders got put on a bus to San Clemente.

translation.en: - They dumped all our surveillance? - Yeah, at the same time. Nine p.m.

translation.en: You hear from him yet?

translation.en: Who are you?

translation.en: Waingro. My name's Waingro.

translation.en: I've been living in this office day and night. How well do you know him?

translation.en: Oh, we took some major scores together.

translation.en: How come I haven't heard from him?

translation.en: Well, he's probably busy right now, but he's real thorough.
